Taxon name.Name: Aspergillus quadrilineatus
Taxon name.Synonymy:
Current name: Aspergillus quadrilineatus Thom & Raper 1939 MB#275888 
Taxonomic synonyms: 
   - Aspergillus floriformis Samson & Mouchacca 1975 MB#309219 
   - Aspergillus nidulans var. acristatus Fennell & Raper 1955 MB#123938 
         - Emericella nidulans var. acristata (Fennell & Raper) Subramanian 1972 MB#348078 
         - Emericella acristata (Fennell & Raper) Y. Horie 1980 MB#110627 
   - Aspergillus parvathecius Raper & Fennell 1965 MB#326647 
         - Emericella parvathecia (Raper & Fennell) Malloch & Cain 1972 MB#348555 
   - Aspergillus microthecius Samson & W. Gams 1986 MB#114710 
   - Emericella quadrilineata (Thom & Raper) C.R. Benjamin 1955 MB#297146 
   - Aspergillus tetrazonus Samson & W. Gams 1986 MB#114719 
   - Aspergillus acristatulus M.A. Ismail, Abdel-Sater & Zohri 1995 MB#363645 
   - Emericella miyajii Y. Horie 1997 MB#437697 
   - Aspergillus miyajii Y. Horie 1997 MB#437698

Substrate of isolation: human finger nail scrapings (60 years old woman)
Restrictions on use: for commercial development a special agreement is requested
Nagoya protocol restrictions and complia: no known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol
History: IHEM, 2008 < Unitat de Microbiologia, Universitat Rovira i Virgili, Reus, Spain <
